sentences.en: A. D. is the abbreviation for " advertisement " .
sentences.cn: A. D. 是 advertisement 的缩写.

sentences.en: He has taken out a half-page advertisement in his local paper to put his point across.
sentences.cn: 他拿出他们当地报纸上的半页广告来说明他的观点。

sentences.en: I learnt of the position through a newspaper advertisement.
sentences.cn: 我是从报纸广告上得悉有此职位的.

sentences.en: I wish to insert an advertisement in your newspaper.
sentences.cn: 我想在贵报上登一则广告.

sentences.en: Miss Parrish recently placed an advertisement in the local news-paper.
sentences.cn: 帕里什小姐最近在本埠报纸上登了一则广告。

sentences.en: Only a handful of people answered the advertisement .
sentences.cn: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

sentences.en: Please post up this advertisement for our concert in your shop window.
sentences.cn: 请把这张我们音乐会的海报贴在贵店窗户上.

sentences.en: Put an advertisement in the local paper to sell your car.
sentences.cn: 在当地报纸登一则广告来出售你的汽车。

sentences.en: Requests for information flooded in after the advertisement.
sentences.cn: 广告登出后,索取资料的信件像雪片般飞来.

sentences.en: The advertisement is aimed at people in their 20 s with high disposable incomes.
sentences.cn: 这个广告的对象是那些二十多岁且可支配收入高的人士.

sentences.en: The England team were a poor advertisement for European football tonight.
sentences.cn: 英格兰队今晚为欧洲足球做了一次糟糕的宣传。

sentences.en: The organizers of the concert had taken out a full page advertisement in ‘The New York Times’.
sentences.cn: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.en: The powers that be, in this case the independent Television Association, banned the advertisement altogether.
sentences.cn: 掌权的，在这件事中即独立的电视协会，干脆禁播了那则电视广告。

sentences.en: They placed an advertisement in the local paper for a secretary.
sentences.cn: 他们在当地报纸上登了一则招聘秘书的广告。

sentences.en: They put an advertisement in ‘The Morning News’, offering a high salary for the right person.
sentences.cn: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.en: To their surprise, hundreds replied to the advertisement.
sentences.cn: 令他们吃惊的是，有几百人对广告作出了回应。

sentences.en: TV viewers have been writing in to complain of the false advertisement.
sentences.cn: 电视观众不断来信抱怨虚假广告.

words.tran_cn: 广告客户；刊登广告的人
社论式广告（指常作为杂志中心插页的正式广告文字）
登广告（advertise的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a picture, set of words, or a short film, which is intended to persuade people to buy a product or use a service, or that gives information about a job that is available, an event that is going to happen etc
